body_html:
It doesn't work for me. After cleaning and updating conda, conda found an even older version of pytorch

conda install pytorch torchvision -c pytorch
Fetching package metadata ...........
Solving package specifications: .

Package plan for installation in environment /home/mingdachen/anaconda2/envs/py35:

The following NEW packages will be INSTALLED:

cudatoolkit: 8.0-3
cudnn:       6.0.21-cuda8.0_0
nccl:        1.3.4-cuda8.0_1
pytorch:     0.1.12-py35cuda8.0cudnn6.0_1
torchvision: 0.1.8-py35_0

Proceed ([y]/n)?

body:
It doesn't work for me. After cleaning and updating conda, conda found an even older version of pytorch

conda install pytorch torchvision -c pytorch
Fetching package metadata ...........
Solving package specifications: .

Package plan for installation in environment /home/mingdachen/anaconda2/envs/py35:

The following NEW packages will be INSTALLED:

    cudatoolkit: 8.0-3
    cudnn:       6.0.21-cuda8.0_0
    nccl:        1.3.4-cuda8.0_1
    pytorch:     0.1.12-py35cuda8.0cudnn6.0_1
    torchvision: 0.1.8-py35_0

Proceed ([y]/n)?
